hero.heading: Best practices for managing your infrastructure and security lifecycle
hero.subtitle: Best practices for managing your infrastructure and security lifecycle

overview.heading: Well-Architected Framework (WAF)
overview.body: Find resources to define and automate your processes, optimize your resources and costs, design reliable systems, and secure your infrastructure and services.

cards.title: Define and automate processes
cards.description: Establish repeatable, scalable workflows that reduce manual effort and human error while enabling teams to deliver infrastructure and applications consistently

cards.title: Secure systems
cards.description: Implement security controls including identity and access management, data protection, secrets management, and network security to prevent unauthorized access and protect sensitive information

cards.title: Design resilient systems
cards.description: Build fault-tolerant architectures that maintain availability and performance during failures through redundancy, disaster recovery planning, zero-downtime deployments, and robust networking strategies

cards.title: Optimize systems
cards.description: Maximize efficiency and minimize waste by right-sizing infrastructure, managing costs, monitoring performance, and implementing dynamic scaling strategies that align with actual usage patterns
